charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across Courtney
and Flannery, who were having a Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_0200: Torkoal! Let’s him ’em with the usual!
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_0300: Camerupt... I’ll leave it up...to you. ♪
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_0500: Now’s our chance! Finish it, Torkoal!
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_0700: Uh... This might not be any of my business...
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_0800: but your Camerupt looked lost and uncertain.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_0900:
Maybe you and your partner should have a
fiery heart-to-heart and work things out.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_1000: But hey, that’s just what I saw. See ya!
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_1800:
My...my Camerupt. Given to me...
By Leader Maxie...
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_1900:
Camerupt is...strong... I believe in Camerupt.
With all...of my heart...
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_2000:
But. That Gym Leader. How can she talk...about
my Camerupt...like she knows my Camerupt!
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_0302_2300: You believe in her...but that’s it?
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_2500: All of you...believe...in your partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_2700:
Camerupt is strong...so I believe in her...
What could be wrong...with that?
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_0301_2800:
That’s not what being partners
is about.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_0302_3000: Partners have to support each other.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_3400: When she wins...I tell her...how great she did...
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_3500: I’ve always been...so nice to her...
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_3600: That’s what it means...to be partners. Doesn’t it?
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_0301_3700: You can’t just heap praise on her.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_0401_3800:
But...but I have to praise her when she
does well...don’t I?
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_0302_3900:
What do you do when Camerupt
makes a mistake?
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_4200: I think I get...what you mean.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_4300: Leader Maxie... That’s how he was...with me.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_4400: He always set me straight...when I made mistakes.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_4500:
Thanks to that...I was able to accomplish so
much. As a Team Magma admin.
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_4600:
Thank...you. I understand...thanks to you...and that
Gym Leader...
charaepi_ch0222_00_kagari/2301_1201_4700: So now... It’s. Time. To. Experiment.
